name: The Tale of Two Nekos
storyline:
In the beginning, God created the heavens and earth. But the heavens and earth we know almost didn’t survive. In the 1100s, a rift opened up with a star falling down and coming to our planet. But it was stopped not too long after, God was able to Trace down who sent it.

It has been traced to another world. The ruler of the other side is responsible. Her name is Shen. She is the queen of a great evil power group named Kailon.

The year 1329 is known today as the Great Assassination of 1329, when the angels confronted and killed the leader of the Kailon. Then the world was at peace... until 1711. There was a girl named Nicole Sandro. She gave respect to those without hope.

The Kailon, however, created a weapon and used it on their first target, Nicole Sandro. After that, they blew up the oil fuse and took what they needed, causing an entire ARSON

1 year later, this was the resurrection of Nicole Sandro. God gave her a so-called spiritual orb of life that could transform her into a goddess of the world. This was also Dark Queen Shen's resurrection. Everything was at stake.

Nicole Sandro discovered a way to help our angels and our planet. She discovered a magical source that's still revolutionary today, named Lunelle.

It has many subdivisions .There was even a forest dedicated to this magic, called Lunelle Forest, which was off-limits to all.

Back to the Kailon... they have planned much more than before and their group has expanded. We have not heard from them... until now, in the present
summary: The Tale of Two Nekoes is a 2D RPG game with 3 stories to play through; Dante's Tale, Akari's Tale, and the Final Tale. This battle system is inspired by the first 6 Final Fantasy games while also having some original aspects as well.
